articles.description: All the latest transfer news and reaction as Leeds and Sunderland are knocked out of the EFL Cup and Celtic exit Champions League.
articles.title: Reaction as Leeds and Sunderland out of EFL Cup and Celtic exit Champions League

articles.description: Wolves reject Newcastle's second bid for striker Jorgen Strand Larsen, who scored twice in the win over West Ham on Tuesday night.
articles.title: Wolves: Wolves reject £55m bid from Newcastle United for Jorgen Strand Larsen

articles.description: Keegan Bradley faces an unenviable task as he makes the final call on whether to include himself as a playing-captain in the US Ryder Cup team, writes Iain Carter.
articles.title: Ryder Cup: US captain set to make 'controversial' wildcard picks to face Europe

articles.description: BBC Scotland chief sportswriter Tom English analyses the causes of - and the likely fallout from - Celtic's Champions League exit.
articles.title: Celtic out of Champions League: The reasons for embarrassing exit

articles.description: Britain's Jacob Fearnley secures the first US Open main-draw win of his career after coming through a testing first-round match.
articles.title: US Open 2025: Jacob Fearnley overcomes nerves to beat Roberto Bautista Agut & set up Alexander Zverev clash

articles.description: Crystal Palace agree a deal in principle worth up to £26m with Villarreal for Spain winger Yeremy Pino.
articles.title: Yeremy Pino: Crystal Palace agree £26m deal in principle for Villarreal winger

articles.description: Lewis Hamilton and Ferrari have struggled for competitiveness so far in 2025. Andrew Benson analyses why it has not worked so far.
articles.title: Lewis Hamilton, Ferrari, the effect of ageing in an athlete and the quest for a 'magic solution'

articles.description: Former India off-spinner Ravichandran Ashwin retires from the Indian Premier League (IPL) with plans to play in other franchise leagues across the world.
articles.title: Ravichandran Ashwin retires from IPL and hopes to play in other franchise leagues

articles.description: Rangers head coach Russell Martin says Rangers are moving forward as they attempt to overturn a Champions League play-off deficit against Club Brugge.
articles.title: Russell Martin: Rangers boss says club are 'calm' going into Champions League play-off with Club Brugge

articles.description: Grimsby Town chief executive Polly Bancroft talks to BBC Sport as the League Two side prepare to welcome her old club, Manchester United, in the second round of the Carabao Cup.
articles.title: Carabao Cup second round: Rare Man Utd visit a highlight for Grimsby Town chief
